Detailed Description

Interface for chunk copying.

to use this Interface see example "copychunks".

Definition at line 23 of file chunkcopy_intf.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual tResult AddStreamToCopy ( const tUInt16  ui16StreamIdFrom,
const tUInt16  ui16StreamIdNew,
const tChar *  strStreamName 
)
pure virtual

Copies the stream information of the ui16StreamIdFrom from the source file to the new stream ui16StreamIdNew (with a new name).

Call this function as many streams you want to copy.

Parameters
[in]ui16StreamIdFromStreamID of the source file.
[in]ui16StreamIdNewStreamID of the destination file.
[in]strStreamNameName of the destination stream.
Return values
ERR_NOERRORstream successfully copied.
virtual tResult CopyNext ( )
pure virtual

Copies the next data block of a stream you added by AddStreamToCopy from source to destination file.

Return values
ERR_EOFend of source file reached.
ERR_NOERRORdata block copied successfully.
static IChunkCopy* Create ( )
static

Creates an instance of cChunkCopy.

Returns
A pointer to the newly created instance
virtual tResult CreateFile ( const tChar *  strFileName,
tUInt32  ui32Flags = 0 
)
pure virtual

Creates a destination DAT file.

Parameters
[in]strFileNameThe filename as null terminated string (relative or absolute path)
[in]ui32FlagsFlags which describe the writing behavior (e.g. synchronous or asynchronous). See adtfstreaming::tOpenMode to get all available flags
Return values
ERR_NOERRORFile successfully created
ERR_FAILEDFailed to create
ERR_ACCESS_DENIEDCould not create file becase of access restrictions.
virtual tResult FindExtension ( const tChar *  strIdentifier,
const cADTFFileExtension **  ppExtension 
)
pure virtual

Gets the given extension content.

The content is contained in a class object named cADTFFileExtension.

Parameters
[in]strIdentifierExtension name
[out]ppExtensionContent of the extension
Return values
ERR_NOT_FOUNDgiven identifier not found in extensions of the source file
Remarks
The pointer ppExtension is only valid until the next call of GetExtension or FindExtension.

pure virtual

Gets the current chunk index.

Returns
the current chunk index
virtual tInt64 GetDataBlockCount ( const tUInt16  ui16StreamId = 0)
pure virtual

Gets the chunk count.

The function retrieves the number of chunks the ADTF DAT file contains, when it is opened.

Parameters
[in]ui16StreamIdID of the stream (optional, 0 = all streams)
Returns
the number of chunks
virtual tResult GetExtension ( const tInt  nIndex,
const cADTFFileExtension **  ppExtension 
)
pure virtual

Gets the given extension content.

The content is contained in a class object named cADTFFileExtension.

Parameters
[in]nIndexIndex of the extension
[out]ppExtensionContent of the extension
Return values
ERR_NOT_FOUNDno extension found for the specified index
ERR_POINTERpointer NULL submitted
Remarks
The pointer ppExtension is only valid until the next call of GetExtension or FindExtension.
virtual tInt GetExtensionCount ( )
pure virtual

Gets the extension count.

The function retrieves the number of extensions the ADTF DAT file contains.

Returns
the number of extensions
virtual tInt64 GetIndexBlockCount ( )
pure virtual

Gets the index block count.

The function retrieves the number of index entries in the master index table the ADTF DAT file contains, when it is opened.

Returns
the number of index entries
virtual tResult GetStreamId ( const tChar *  strName,
tUInt16 &  ui16StreamId 
)
pure virtual

Find the stream ID to the corresponding name.

The function returns the stream ID for the given name if the stream exists.

Parameters
[in]strNameName of the stream, case sensitive
[out]ui16StreamIdID of the stream with name strName
Return values
ERR_POINTERNull-pointer committed
ERR_UNKNOWNStream name was not found
virtual const tChar* GetStreamName ( tUInt16  ui16StreamId)
pure virtual

Seeks the stream name.

The function seeks the stream name for the given ID if the stream exists.

Parameters
[in]ui16StreamIdID of the stream
Returns
the name of the stream with given ID if the stream exists or NULL otherwise.
virtual tTimeStamp GetTimeDuration ( )
pure virtual

Gets the time duration.

The function retrieves the time the file is lasting.

Returns
the time
virtual tResult Open ( const tChar *  strFileName)
pure virtual

Opens the source ADTF DAT file.

This class can open the DAT file only in reading access mode.

Parameters
[in]strFileNameThe filename as null terminated string (relative or absolute path)
Return values
ERR_POINTERNull-pointer committed

static

Releases an instance of cChunkCopy.

Parameters
[in]pCopierPointer to the instance to release
Return values
ERR_POINTERNull-pointer committed
virtual tInt64 Seek ( tInt64  i64DataBlockPos)
pure virtual

Seeks the DAT file.

The seek method jumps to the chunk with the given index. The next IChunkCopy::Copy call will read the specified chunk.

Parameters
[in]i64DataBlockPosThe index of the chunk (between 0 and chunk count)
Returns
the current chunk index
virtual tInt64 Seek ( tUInt16  nStreamId,
tInt64  nDataBlockPos 
)
pure virtual

Seeks the DAT file.

The seek method jumps to the chunk in the current stream with the given index. The next IChunkCopy::Copy call will read the specified chunk.

Parameters
[in]nStreamIdThe ID of the stream to seek
[in]nDataBlockPosThe index of the chunk (between 0 and chunk count)
Returns
the current chunk index
virtual tInt64 SeekTime ( tTimeStamp  tmTimePos)
pure virtual

Seeks the DAT file.

The seek method jumps to the given time. The next IChunkCopy::Copy() call will read the next chunk at or after the specified time.

Warning
IIndexedFileReader will crash if tmTimePos is smaller than the file offset.
Parameters
[in]tmTimePosThe file time in microseconds
Returns
the current chunk index
